prompts.flat_lay:
Professional e-commerce flat lay photograph of Ron Dorff Swim Briefs w. Waistband in Sand, 80% polyamide, 20% elasthanne.

COMPOSITION: Bird's eye view. Swim briefs laid perfectly flat showing full front view. Distinctive waistband clearly visible at top.

GARMENT DETAILS - MUST BE EXACT:
- WAISTBAND: Distinctive elastic waistband at top (likely with Ron Dorff branding)
- EYELETS: Two small BLACK metal eyelets (dark/gunmetal color, NOT silver) positioned at the lower front area
- STYLE: Classic swim brief with waistband construction
- Clean, athletic cut

STYLING: Briefs laid completely flat and smooth. Waistband positioned naturally at top. Clean presentation showing construction details.

COLOR: Match the EXACT "Sand" color from the input image - warm beige/tan tone, earthy and neutral. NOT gray, NOT cream. Natural sandy beige with warmth.

MATERIAL: Smooth swimwear fabric with subtle sheen (80% polyamide, 20% elasthanne). Show the sleek texture and waistband construction.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting with even illumination. Highlight the smooth fabric and waistband details.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface. Clean, seamless backdrop.

High-end swimwear e-commerce aesthetic.
